metadata.Title: CVE-2022-20424 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: ** REJECT ** DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: none. Reason: This candidate was withdrawn by its CNA. Further investigation showed that it was not a security issue. Notes: none.

criterions.comment: linux-gke: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
